headline: AGCO wants 'national policy' on farmers' right to repair: CEO
summary: Right to repair has become a key focus for American farmers. Congress has introduced legislation to make it easier for farmers to repair equipment without needing authorization from the vendor. AGCO (AGCO) CEO Eric Hansotia joins Market Catalyst to discuss how the agricultural equipment and parts maker is thinking about right-to-repair policies. Also catch AGCO CEO Eric Hansotia discuss American farmer sentiments on the US-China trade agreements around soybeans (ZS=F). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

content.title: AGCO wants 'national policy' on farmers' right to repair: CEO
content.description:
Right to repair has become a key focus for American farmers. Congress has introduced legislation to make it easier for farmers to repair equipment without needing authorization from the vendor.

AGCO (AGCO) CEO Eric Hansotia joins Market Catalyst to discuss how the agricultural equipment and parts maker is thinking about right-to-repair policies.

Also catch AGCO CEO Eric Hansotia discuss American farmer sentiments on the US-China trade agreements around soybeans (ZS=F).

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
